00041 int CommandExists::run() {
00042   int error;
00043   bool exists;
00044 
00045   if (m_args.size() != 1) {
00046     cerr << "Wrong number of arguments.  Type 'help' for usage." << endl;
00047     return -1;
00048   }
00049 
00050   if (m_args[0].second != "") {
00051     cerr << "Invalid argument - " << m_args[0].second << endl;
00052     return -1;
00053   }
00054 
00055   if ((error = m_session->exists(m_args[0].first, &exists)) == Error::OK) {
00056     if (exists)
00057       cout << "true" << endl;
00058     else {
00059       cout << "false" << endl;
00060       Global::exit_status = 1;
00061     }
00062   }
00063 
00064   return error;
00065 }
